titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week beginning March 19, 1989, as "National Merit Shop Pride and Productivity Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Designates the week beginning March 19, 1989, as National Merit Shop Pride and Productivity Week.
